column4: well... I got 3 ubuntu costers! tried to install 3 times and ubuntu could not deal with my 6800 card, waht a shame I really wanted a 64bit with gnome...
feels like this preview shouldn't have been released
looks like the ubuntu team just rushing to get something out without proper testing or documantation
so open a bug, and help them get it fixed. that is the point of a preview release, to help them work out bugs. complaining and saying they shouldn't have released anything is worthless
i guess i'm a bit frustrated :) i will report a bug though
